mapper.select:
SELECT TWFTASKDEF.ID, TWFTASKDEF.TASKTYPE, TWFTASKDEF.WFTKDID, TWFTASKDEF.SERVICETYPE, TWFTASKDEF.PARENTID, TWFTASKDEF.TASKORDER AS order, TWFTASKDEF.VIEWABLE, TWFTASKDEF.NAME, TWFTASKDEF.ALISE, TWFTASKDEF.WFDID, TWFTASKDEF.WFTKDKEY AS key FROM WF_TASK_DEF TWFTASKDEF WHERE
AND TWFTASKDEF.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WF_TASK_DEF ( ID, TASKTYPE, WFTKDID, SERVICETYPE, PARENTID, TASKORDER, VIEWABLE, NAME, ALISE, WFDID, WFTKDKEY ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{taskType}, #{wftkdId}, #{serviceType}, #{parentId}, #{order}, #{viewAble}, #{name}, #{alise}, #{wfdId}, #{key} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM WF_TASK_DEF TWFTASKDEF WHERE
AND TWFTASKDEF.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE WF_TASK_DEF TWFTASKDEF
TASKTYPE = #{taskType,javaType=java.lang.String},
WFTKDID = #{wftkdId,javaType=java.lang.String},
SERVICETYPE = #{serviceType,javaType=java.lang.String},
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
TASKORDER = #{order,javaType=int},
VIEWABLE = #{viewAble,javaType=boolean},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
ALISE = #{alise,javaType=java.lang.String},
WFDID = #{wfdId,javaType=java.lang.String},
WFTKDKEY = #{key,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE TWFTASKDEF.ID = #{id}
